channel.title: Project Zeus | Level Setting | Eco | VPS | Webhost
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1grhxj.jpg[/img][Center]
[CENTER]Project Zeus's goal is to make an easy & enjoyable pking/pvm server where you can have fun, and not have to grind to gain the armors you want, but its not so easy your bored within a day. We hope you our server, and we will do everything in our power to make sure of it! We offer variates of places to PK, and reason to go to each one. All of the Boss's are mutli meaning you'll be fighting everyone for drops making it a lot harder to obtain those rare items.
We have an awesome VPS with 5.5g of ram, 8 virtual processors, 40g of disk space, and 1500G of bandwidth. We should have ANY lag issues :) [/CENTER]
[Center] [URL=http://projectzeus.net]Website[/URL] | [URL=http://www.projectzeus.net/forum/viewforum.php?f=12]Client Download[/URL]|[URL=http://www.projectzeus.net/forum/viewforum.php?f=13]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://www.projectzeus.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=5]Beginners Guide[/URL]
Server Features
*Nomad *Nex *Tormented Demons *Custom Quest Tab *3 Pking Zones *Easy money *Level Setting *Reward Tokens from PvM
Server Media
[IMG]http://projectzeus.net/Quest_Tab.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/dragons_tele.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/tormentdemon_tele.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/nex_tele.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/Nomad_tele.png[/img]
Rewards shop(Guthix Tokens) [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/shop_pvm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://projectzeus.net/shop_archery.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/shop_armor.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/shop_barrows.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/shop_capes.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/shop_jewlry.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/shop_potions.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/shop_pures.png[/img] [IMG]http://projectzeus.net/Home_tele.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Project Zeus | Level Setting | Eco | VPS | Webhost
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:8, topic:462214”][quote author=Xi Xi Xi link=topic=565169.msg4113176#msg4113176 date=1348751428]

Revolutionization is such a strong word. Evolving would be better.

I stand behind my words revolutionize, because I do want to change it radically. I have more updates in mind then most server. I can grantee that!
[/quote]
thats wut they all say[/quote]

We mean what we say, if you ask any of our members, we listen to their ideas and try our best implement them.

Read full topic
